caption: I thought I'd say something nice to the Google Sheets because I think that people who work on software should hear something nice every now and then. After I sent that, I remembered these are all people getting paid $250K+ fuel an organization that will do anything to gain leverage, including destroying democracy and human rights. Think before you fill out a feedback dialog!
